content: madie s beanie by magdagast sizes adult unisex measurements fits head circumference of approx 54-58cm 20¾-22½ inches knitting gauge 12 sts x 19 rounds with stocking stich = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 inches on l needles size 7 mm 10 75 us size suggested needles circular or double pointed needles size 6 mm /10 us size / 40 cm or 80 cm circular needle when knitting magic loop for cast on and for the first 10cm of a hat and 7 mm circular or double pointed needles to knit rest of the hat and shape the crown materials 100 g air drops garnstudio 50 g = 150m 164yds knitted with two strands held together weight of the hat is around 70-75g
